website_summaries.verdict: Users say these compact dumbbells are great for active, heart-pumping workouts with lots of movement.
pros: Available in a handful of weight levels and colours
Compact design good for many kinds of active workouts
cons: Some complaints about size of grip

customer_reviews.title: Damn dangerous at best. Appalling quality
customer_reviews.text: Dumbells broke into two after 5 weeks - having been used by my daughter twice a week. Bearing in mind the exercises these can be used for it's a miracle that she hasn't been hurt. Damn dangerous at best. Appalling quality, wouldn't have a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: extorting customers during the devastation of COVID £42 for £5 weights.
customer_reviews.text: These are some lovely weights. However in a time when people are struggling and attempting to look after each other and themselves it really sucks that there are companies capitalising off the pain and suffering COVID is causing my inflating prices. Shame on the companies trying to extort people. Should point out that in the desperate times we pod £42 for this set. Who does that. No conscience
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: These are a well-made and excellent little pair of dumbells. Moreso as I could not find them cheaper anywhere else (£3.99. I'm a 'lady of a certain age' who is not looking to build muscles and qualify for the Miss Universe Contest. Rather, I just want to tone my arms. I researched the internet and found that these 1kg weights were ample. Certainly heavier and easier to hold than the Baked Beans cans I had been using.
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Much admired
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 x 1kg weights for my Zumba classes. They cost me £8.99, which was more than many of the other choices but I chose them for the lovely colour. I see that today they are only £4.99, which is quite annoying. They are shorter and neater than the ones other women in my class have and they have been quite envious. They all wanted to know where I got them. The grip length is 3.5 inches, which is a perfect fit for my, and others, hands and they don't slide when being swung over my head, so are more comfortable than larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like to do home exercise videos (Jillian's 30 day shred is incredible and it works!) so I needed a pair of dumbbells for all the weights. These are great quality, soft and comfortable to hold, they do not make my hands calloused and are also a beautiful blue colour. They're small and easy to story, I keep them under my sofa when not in use. I recommend these to anybody who needs a great set of dumbbells to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I’ve bought in 1kg and 3kg. They are wonderfully designed for the home. A nice grip on them and they are ridged so they don’t roll from where you place them. They’re easy to store away and the colours look great. I’m very impressed with them, they make working out at home very easy and I’ve got rid of my gym membership from buying products on amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Do They Fink I'm Fik?
customer_reviews.text: Why do they call them dumbbells? I have an IQ of 9 you know! I'm a drummer and I have an injury to my right supraspinatus, for those that don't know, that's the muscle that runs from the lower neck across the top of the shoulder. Not good for a drummer of a certain age (73) I started off with a gentle 10 lifts lying on my left hand side with my arm straight. I'm now up to 50 arm lifts and the shoulder is getting stronger by the day. These 2kg dumbbells are perfect for this.
customer_reviews.author: STIX

customer_reviews.title: tiny, tiny hands required
customer_reviews.text: I am an average sized man and have never had it mentioned that I have big hands. I suppose because I don't. However these were so small they do not fit well and part of the round end is part of what you grip awkwardly. I have sort of adjusted to them and use them (watching tv) but they are not ideal. Now if I was Ken or Barbie they would be a terrific fit.
customer_reviews.author: Not a critic

customer_reviews.title: Just Weighing In
customer_reviews.text: For those of us who'd like to get into shape... Or change shape, as round IS a shape, although not perhaps the shape you wish to be, far be it from me to offer an opinion on shapes... But I digress, this weights are ideal for use in workouts, with a good grippy coating which also acts as slight padding should you accidentally drop them, although the 2kg weight still causes considerable pain if dropped onto toes... They are sturdy and well sealed, despite repeated usage, occasionally accidental drops and one deliberate hurl they have maintained better structural integrity than one would expect from an item as fairly priced as they are.
customer_reviews.author: Belgevain

customer_reviews.title: just the job for me
customer_reviews.text: these dumbbells at 2 kilograms each are ideal for doing a workout on your arms in any free time that you have. they are well made and come in soft covering. i would definitly recommend
customer_reviews.author: tommo

customer_reviews.title: Raising prices to profit of lockdowns
customer_reviews.text: They’re good but raising the price from £12.38 to almost £33 is shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Robust, good small dumbbells. Simple, but they work.
customer_reviews.text: I used to jog and use dumbbells at home, many years ago. No room for a running machine, no time to go jogging or to a gym nowadays. These two simple and quite small weights can give you a very good workout. My winter tactic: turn off the heating. When you start feeling cold, get these out and you'll soon warm up!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Balcombe

customer_reviews.title: well designed
customer_reviews.text: These two kilo weights are easy on the hands, the grip is good and does not hurt when you lift them' the feeling is good too, not icy cold. I use them every day in my exercises.Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael Domnin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Ideal low weight for exercising an injured shoulder. There are other weights in the series that are colour coded, which is useful. Didn't need two and they are not likely to wear out and it makes getting a set quite expensive. However there are plenty of exercises which require two dumbbell, so can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: These are really well made and great if you are at an intermediate level. Beginner level weights should be between 1-3kg. These are perfect for my workout, and the hexagonal ends make them easy to hold, and stop them from rolling. They were also good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms R Adams

customer_reviews.title: strength
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and needed so will use every other day. Black is fine and I am use to them as have used some at the gym but decided to stop going a couple of weeks ago due to COV19 plus I am just getting over being poorly.Looking forward to using them
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Great dumbbells for beginners. A good weight to start with and comfortable to hold. I can feel that my arms have had a workout the next day! I plan to use these for a few weeks before moving up to a heavier weight. Great price too - would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic dumbbells!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dumbbells. Fab quality, very easy to hold. Arrived very quickly in excellent packaging. Great for my low impact Barre/Pilates workouts. Would highly recommend this brand and seller!! Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: Great weights, comfy to hold and lovely colour
customer_reviews.text: These weights are great for people looking to do a bit of a work out at home. The grip is very comfy and the blue colour is lovely. I've had a number of items from yoga-mad in the past and always been happy with how long they have lasted, so hopefully these will last me for ages too. Overall a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: han24

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to hold, with a soft touch matte rubberised surface. The shape of the sides means that they won’t roll away if put down on a flat surface. Good weight for simple exercises/stretches or as starting weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the misleading picture!
customer_reviews.text: Good dumbell. However I was expected two due to the plural dumbells in the description and the picture of two! Very misleading not happy at all! £20 for one is very expensive for a very basic and small weight not worth the money £20 for two would have been ok not good but £20 for one disgusting. Clearly taking advantage of the current pandemic disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: emma keegan

customer_reviews.title: Ideal as an extra for cardio workouts
customer_reviews.text: After buying various weights getting heavier we realised that what we also needed was some very light weight ones for cardio workouts and high reps. These are just perfect to don’t really notice them at first but if you are working hard by the end of the work out you know you’ve used them. Absolutely idea
customer_reviews.author: lorna purser

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is easy and comfortable to hold and carry. They are wonderfully designed to use at home. My son was interesting in these so when I found them I bought them, as he is young and these are not heavy so suitable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Erhanz

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely durable and comfortable even for long periods of holding good grip would
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, I got the size 1.5 to balance me between my 1kg and my 2kg weights while I Get back into it,. Lovely colour, they put up with being knocked kicked and thrown about and not a single scratch on them! They are extremely durable and comfortable even for long periods of holding good grip would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Easy grip, easy to use. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with weights. Exactly what I needed to use at home in lockdown. Easy to hold, they don't slip. Easy to store, they don't roll due to angles.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Fitness
customer_reviews.text: For the ladies who need to keep arms firm but not muscly. Was unable to get a 2kg at the time of purchase so I use both at a time. Will be better to purchase a 2kg instead.
customer_reviews.author: Leisure

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable in use....."Goldilocks" level...."not too heavy ...not too light ....just right!". A great encouragement to carry on, and on, and on.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Get the right weight for you.
customer_reviews.text: They are really great for beginners who are trying to get a little bit fitter. I brought the Purple ones and they are a nice size and weight to use . And you can use them anywhere even on holidays .
customer_reviews.author: Jumping jack.

customer_reviews.title: Pink 0.5kg
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pink 0.5kg set of 2 dumbells which fit my hand perfectly. The neoprene provides a good grip and protects surfaces. One weighs 504g and the other 537g! UPDATE: I've been using these every day for nearly 3 months from purchase. I absolutely love them and are a joy to use whilst watching TV!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz04

customer_reviews.title: Great price and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my exercise class that I attend, just had a knee replacement operation so I can roll my foot back and forward easily On these which helps Exercise , great price easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good they don't slip. I recommend them and they are very good for the price. Recommend to use 5Kg These are a well-made. I could not find them cheaper anywhere else. Arrived quickly as advertised. I like the texture of the grips so even when you're sweaty you know that your grip won't slip. Material feels very solid and not cheap. Def recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuele

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money and by ordering these with another £5 item, I got free delivery, too. This has to be a bargain, because postage for this heavy item was a little more than £5. These are small, neat dumbbells with a comfortable neoprene flock covering. I bought the 1 kg weights since I I need a fairly gentle exercise routine and these are a good weight and size for use without undue strain.
customer_reviews.author: Aletheuon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for workouts during lockdown at home. They feel nice to hold - soft outer. Not that heavy but after constant repititions they get heavier!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Clark

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered the 5kg ones by accident so exchanged them for the 3kg ones, so much better! Do the job, not much to really comment on other than that. One think I would say though is that the white lettering looked slightly scuffed and dirty as though they'd been used before.. not sure if it was just mine or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good wee hand weights
customer_reviews.text: Nice wee dumbells, a good size for holding while doing some cardio moves like marching etc. I use them for classes with older folks. I would give them 5 stars but I prefer Fitness Mad's own foam covered weights with the wee straps. Hard to find them though.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great for workout
customer_reviews.text: They have a good grip on them which is a decent. I use them everyday and are still holding. Cant go to the gym cause of lock down so have to make do. Would recommend for beginners
customer_reviews.author: James Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work out with
customer_reviews.text: These are ideal for repetition exercises, I have rheumatoid arthritis so I can't work with anything heavier they are very good quality and easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: safiyyah

customer_reviews.title: easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: The one kilo weight is perfect for me on a HIT workout. non slip coating is good and most importantly easy to hold onto with slim middle bars
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Good Weights
customer_reviews.text: These items have a pleasant 'soft touch' feel making them easy to hold and move securely. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Moore

customer_reviews.title: Bit uncomfortable for small hands!
customer_reviews.text: Good weights but I have small hands and found that they were rather uncomfortable to hold safely. The middle part that you hold is quite thick which made certain movements hard to do, I felt like I couldn't get a really good grip on them.
customer_reviews.author: Locket81

customer_reviews.title: Great material and size
customer_reviews.text: Came with slight damage but does not affect the use of the product. A bit upset that they did not come in perfect condition, though. I have had the 2kg dumbells of the same brand and material for years, and I loved the material and size of the weights, so it was clear that I should stick with this brand when I wanted a heavier weight. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Shona

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I already have the 1kg weights from Fitness Mad and wanted to upgrade to these 2kg ones. They’re such good quality, the surface texture allows good grip and it’s a nice colour. Perfect for home cardio and mat exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Rikachu

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Impingement Pain Begone
customer_reviews.text: Just the weight necessary to exercise on my aftermath repair road of shoulder impingement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ideal addition to my home made gym. Good quality, non slip. Hopefully, in these testing times, should help me maintain fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Chezzer

customer_reviews.title: Good Dumbells
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - comfortable to hold and absolutely perfect for my needs. If I need a different weight I will buy the same brand. An added bonus is that I found out they are also easy to clean when the dog shook muddy water over them. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 'Marble'

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, specially when you put them down
customer_reviews.text: The physiotherapist recommended these. They are still quite heavy for a lady past her prime, but are helping my arm to get better.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Great light handheld weights
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I do a lot of barre and was looking for the perfect light, handheld weights. Most are over priced and have a strange texture to them, but these are great. And i appreciate that they come in a pack of two!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter, she has found them great to use, comfortable to hold and just the right weight for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: suitable for beginners and elderly
customer_reviews.text: These were just the perfect weight for my elderly friend who, through a fall , had to start to build her strength up in her arm and shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: jytte raff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store and great to use
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant to use when watching tv don’t feel as though you are exercising
customer_reviews.author: Lindyloo

customer_reviews.title: Good price, well finished, do the job.
customer_reviews.text: These are good value dumbells that do the business. Well finished and easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Weights
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with them but wouldn’t suggest you start with this weight.
customer_reviews.author: sandra smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this They are right for my hands and very manageable
customer_reviews.author: Anita Rizzetto

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little gadget for home pilates sessions
customer_reviews.text: great grip and excellent for adding some weight to pilates exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Practical weights
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft grip and not too big for storage. Excellent weights that I’ve used loads in lockdown, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Claire H

customer_reviews.title: I found them uncomfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: I can not put my hand on, but I find it very difficult to work out with them, not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Clarke

customer_reviews.title: An ideal product to help my exercise regime
customer_reviews.text: A great product, really nice and easy to grip safely. Delivered really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Searle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to strengthen grip and wrist flexibility for playing the guitar. Wasn't expecting such a good quality for the money, but my physio recommended this brand and I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Playle

customer_reviews.title: Product as described 3kg easy to use dumbells
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these to exercise during lockdown. They were as described, 3kg weights, easy to hold and did the job. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicca

customer_reviews.title: poor manufacture quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2, 3, 4, and 5kg versions. When they turned up, the 4kg version was of poor manufacture. The internal casting was not smooth, and when the coating had been applied, it created ridges and split the coating material. Clearly no quality control in manufacture, but then they are all made in China, so perhaps should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: L. P

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and size for a 9 year old who wants to get fit!
customer_reviews.author: Martine Mccahon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! really great, use them at all my exercise classes!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find. Great tactile and comfortable grip especially as only am a small female. Great for tri and bicep use and warm to the touch plus feel easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: griffin70

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: as described and just right for elderly ladies like me
customer_reviews.author: Junelle

customer_reviews.title: Great weights
customer_reviews.text: Great colour for great weights .... easy to hold too
customer_reviews.author: S.Duncan

customer_reviews.title: speechless
customer_reviews.text: amazing dumbbells, arrived safely, they are so easy to clean and great size/grip texture
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Small hands only!
customer_reviews.text: If you have small hands, then it will just about fit between the sides, this is definitely for a small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Satchi2009

customer_reviews.title: they do the job
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, it's not a hard job for them. There's little that can go wrong. They just need to be fairly comfy to hold, and they feel OK.
customer_reviews.author: maestro

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product and a really reasonable price. They're great for gentle arm exercises, especially as a starter weight for beginners. I guess you could jog with them too but I haven't tried that yet!! They feel very durable and the surface gives you a good grip. So easy, even for lazy people like me - I can exercise while watching TV!
customer_reviews.author: Bells

customer_reviews.title: Late arrival but seem great so far
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived 9 days after the expected date which sucked ‘cause I was waiting for these! These dumbbells seem like good quality and look the same as the product photo so that’s always good. Can’t wait to use these in my at home exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great product, brilliant light weights. Easy to hold and don’t slip. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K. Oreilly

customer_reviews.title: Really nice grip. Using for my daily physio as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived this morning after ordering late last night. Really nice grip. Using for my daily physio as I have CPOD and these work well for the exercises the pulmonary clinic has given me. Fair price also. Have ordered some 1.5kg ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dumbbells. Comfortable to hold and with my need to exercise at home (sat down don’t ask, bad knees). Grew out of my 1kg quiet fast ! I hope to move up and up.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Southall

customer_reviews.title: Great quality very well made I’m thrilled . Will order some more.
customer_reviews.text: I love these dumbbells. The weights I ordered were fantastic love them
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good value - well made.
customer_reviews.text: Benefiting from use of this item from exercises directed by hospital physiotherapist.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: really like these a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure about buying these, but they are just right for me, the colour is good and the feel is good to. Happy all round.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Channon

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercises
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, from good material and I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Orsi A.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal shape and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: I liked these dumbells because they were easy to hold for cardio Rehabilitation exercises
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: These dumbbells are very comfortable to grip and the material on the outside is ...
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy the 2kg dumbbells but after reading some of the reviews I decided to get the 3kg pair. I've never used dumbbells before so I can't compare this pair to any others. These dumbbells are very comfortable to grip and the material on the outside is almost...soft? All in all, happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rabiya M

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 3 days earlier than expected and feels really nice in the hands, good for woman who wanna start with weights as not too heavy and not to big either. Would recommend any time
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. I use them in the morning and ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. I use them in the morning and before going to sleep for exercising. I don't like going to the gym so this works perfectly. The item came on great condition and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: I Like them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any woman that does nor want to build bulky muscles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent weight and perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Small and heavier than I expected which is great. I love my little dumbbells and can’t wait to introduce them to my fitness routine.
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my physiotherapist gave me exercises for arthritis in my hands. These do the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Small hand weights. Easy to use just enough weight to aid me withoutirritating my health problems. Solid well made.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Not 1kg...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the look or feel, but sadly neither dumbbell was 1kg in weight. One was 975g and one 1036g. That’s enough of a difference to be a big problem. Contacted to return and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: tangerinepoppies

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material and accurate weight. Recommended for beginners especially for long time arm excersize. Material and colour are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: The colour makes me happy to leave them out which in turns reminds me to actually use them :)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little set of dumbbells - love the colour - makes me happy to leave them out of the cupboard which in turns reminds me to actually use them :)
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Prompt service
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid dumbbells - I was probably being optimistic about my abilities when I first ordered as they were much heavier than I was expecting. However with regular (ish) use, they are not actually that bad, or I've become much stonger........ Glad I went fo 5KG rather than 4KG. Prompt service
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great item and price
customer_reviews.text: Used for injury rehab really good and take up no space
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dumbbells.
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are comfortable to hold and as described by the manufacturer. They arrived early and safely - thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry.

customer_reviews.title: Good for physio use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for physio after a broke wrist. Much better than a litre bottle of water! Great and easy to use. Also when i have finished with them the grandchildren want to use them
customer_reviews.author: Seasider

customer_reviews.title: Comfy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Comfy to hold and nice and light for beginners. It's easy enough to hold both in ome hand for extra weight if required too.
customer_reviews.author: danielle m.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy I really liked them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and It arrived before the day i was expecting it which is really good. The quality very good and the colour the best!! I really liked them and I am very happy with them I advise whoever wants to buy them to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My physio recommended that I get myself some dumbbells (not too heavy mind), and these fit the bill perfectly. They have a nice soft touch covering which feels secure in the hand (don't want these flying across the room and knocking someone out!). Very pleased with these, and fast delivery from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: MacsGirl

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get much time to use them because I got a knee injury the day I used them so can't say much. But the texture is fine and the weight is good.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: These will be fab when I get round to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: 3kg neurophene dumbells set
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set of dumbells, in use everyday!! Will shop here again :-)
customer_reviews.author: loloso

customer_reviews.title: Great Weights!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the 1kg, 2kg and 3kg weights and they are brilliant! Perfect to add along with your workout to help get rid of those unwanted pounds and build muscle. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Sparkler

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for an order that didn’t arrive, they look great quality and I’m sure my 13 year old son will enjoy building his muscles with these 😁
customer_reviews.author: Suze
